nodes.bodyText: wouldn't it be nice to have add 1 to arrows stuck in player? this syntax doesn't allow that
in fact i'm not sure if arrows stuck of player makes sense at all
Hmm... that's a good point. Will probably not be able to use a SPE for this expression.
you can use an SPE (and should), you just won't be able the prebuilt registration method
Hopefully the new pattern is better.
